scripts.deploy: graph deploy itsib/spaceport-subgraph --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:kovan: graph deploy itsib/spaceport-subgraph-kovan --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ subgraph.kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy itsib/spaceport-subgraph --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 subgraph.kovan.yaml
